divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my patio watching a plane when I noticed lights about the size of stars that appeared to be flying around the sun. I contacted a FI and relayed the info. I have been randomly been taking pictures of the sky and have discovered an anomoly. I dont know if it's related to the event that is taking place right now but I thought I'd submit it.
trends: There have been 30 other sightings in Lafayette
There were no other sightings in Lafayette on or around June 30th 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Anomaly in photo related to present IN sighting.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
